Deadline.Label: Project Kickoff Meeting
Deadline.Description: Initiate the new project with a kickoff meeting to align team members on goals and expectations.

Deadline.Label: Code Refactoring
Deadline.Description: Refactor existing codebase to improve maintainability and performance.

Deadline.Label: Client Feedback Session
Deadline.Description: Meet with the client to gather feedback on the latest deliverables and address any concerns.

Deadline.Label: Database Optimization
Deadline.Description: Optimize database queries and indexes for improved system performance.

Deadline.Label: Team Building Workshop
Deadline.Description: Conduct a team building workshop to strengthen collaboration and communication among team members.

Deadline.Label: Security Audit
Deadline.Description: Perform a security audit to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in the system.

Deadline.Label: User Interface Design Review
Deadline.Description: Review and provide feedback on the user interface design for the upcoming software release.

Deadline.Label: Client Demo
Deadline.Description: Prepare and deliver a demo to showcase the latest features to the client.

Deadline.Label: Documentation Update
Deadline.Description: Update project documentation to reflect recent changes and improvements.

Deadline.Label: Release Planning
Deadline.Description: Plan the upcoming software release, including feature prioritization and scheduling.
